text.__SUMMARY__: Psychotria petitii is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Taita Hills in Kenya and threatened by habitat loss.
text.Sources: Musili, P., Luke, W.R.Q., Barasa, J. & Mathenge, J. (2018). Psychotria petitii. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species 2018: e.T32253A84419050. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.2018-2.RLTS.T32253A84419050.en Downloaded on 12 June 2019.
